column2: comm_theft_perc <- crime_sf %>% filter(PRIMARY.DESCRIPTION %in% c("THEFT") ) %>% group_by(community) %>% summarize(comm_crime_cnt = n()) %>% ungroup() %>% mutate(crime_perc =comm_crime_cnt/sum(comm_crime_cnt))
#plot(comm_theft_perc["crime_perc"], main= "Percent of Thefts by Community Area")
color = "black", check_overlap = F, size=1.5) + ggtitle("Percent of Thefts by Community Areas") + xlab("") + ylab("")
